item.title: DigitalOcean - Install Kubernetes using Ansible
item.description: Quick note: the original post dates from 17-10-2019 but got updated at 01-04-2020 with latest Kubernetes version. Introduction Couple of weeks ago, we have created a post where we created some servers on DigitalOcean.

item.title: DigitalOcean - Create droplets instances with Terraform
item.description: Introduction In this post, we are going to create a server (aka droplets) on DigitalOcean. They will be running Ubuntu. Thereâ€™s plenty of ways doing it but for this post I decided to give Terraform a try.

item.title: Docker-Machine and DigitalOcean
item.description: Quick note: the original post dates from 14-04-2016 but got updated at 01-05-2020 with latest versions and it was essentially written from scratch again.
